verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sunshine rain refreshing reviving rain
Showers from above
Tell us of His love
Sunshine rain refreshing reviving rain
Thank you God for showers from above

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In my heart there rings a melody
There rings a melody
of heavenly harmony
In my heart there rings a melody
There rings a melody of love

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Morning noon and night
I have a song that Jesus taught me
It's a song I love to sing
For it comes from above
